A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a disappointment : / (SPOILERS) After TFA and Rogue One\, The Last Jedi feels like two steps backwards into prequel territory. Excess use of CGI\, excess use of humor(robbing scenes of their emotional impact)\, casino /codebreaker storyline that could literally be removed from the movie and not change anything. The director’s style sticks out like a sore thumb\, every other shot is a close up failing to allow a scene breath with proper framing. People gripe about JJ Abrams and his lens flare style but he knows how to frame a scene and gets the performance he needs from the actors. Luke’s storyline was interesting but poorly executed. Luke is gone\, Snoke is gone ( who TF was he? Who cares)\, Rey is related to... no one (why do we still care now?) Apparently BB8 can do anything\, and oh yeah Leia can survive a space explosion\, use the force to revive herself and shield herself and pull herself towards back into a ship. Who knew. I didn’t.
